abstract: Frank R. Wolf, Republican of Virginia, is challenging the legality of a meeting that the president's science adviser had with Chinese officials in the spring.
snippet: Frank R. Wolf, Republican of Virginia, is challenging the legality of a meeting that the president's science adviser had with Chinese officials in the spring.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the Justice Department have declared that President Obama has the constitutional power to override a statute forbidding members of the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy from engaging in activities with Chinese officials.
